q.quote: This nation will remain the land of the free only so long as it is the home of the brave.
q.author: Elmer Davis

q.quote: Scratch a dog and you'll find a permanent job.
q.author: Franklin P. Jones

q.quote: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
q.author: Confucius

q.quote: Aging is not lost youth but a new stage of opportunity and strength.
q.author: Betty Friedan

q.quote: If you want to conquer fear, don't sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy.
q.author: Dale Carnegie

q.quote: Truth is everybody is going to hurt you: you just gotta find the ones worth suffering for.
q.author: Bob Marley

q.quote: Punishment is justice for the unjust.
q.author: Saint Augustine

q.quote: A wise man can learn more from a foolish question than a fool can learn from a wise answer.
q.author: Bruce Lee

q.quote: Architecture is a visual art, and the buildings speak for themselves.
q.author: Julia Morgan

q.quote: Jealousy is the fear of comparison.
q.author: Max Frisch

q.quote: Learning is not attained by chance, it must be sought for with ardor and diligence.
q.author: Abigail Adams

q.quote: If you tell people where to go, but not how to get there, you'll be amazed at the results.
q.author: Abigail Adams

q.quote: It will never rain roses: when we want to have more roses we must plant more trees.
q.author: George Eliot

q.quote: Learning is not attained by chance, it must be sought for with ardor and diligence.
q.author: Abigail Adams

q.quote: I couldn't find the sports car of my dreams, so I built it myself.
q.author: Ferdinand Porsche
